text: Bryan Keith Robinson, nicknamed "Big Dog", (June 22, 1974June 11, 2016) was an American football defensive tackle. He was originally signed by the St. Louis Rams as an undrafted free agent in 1997. Robinson also played for the Chicago Bears, the Miami Dolphins, the Cincinnati Bengals, and the Arizona Cardinals. On June 11, 2016, Robinson was found dead in a Milwaukee motel room, aged 41. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:2016 deaths Category:African- American players of American football Category:American football defensive ends Category:American football defensive tackles Category:Arizona Cardinals players Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Cincinnati Bengals players Category:Miami Dolphins players Category:Sportspeople from Toledo, Ohio Category:St. Louis Rams players
title: Bryan Robinson
